epa.wait: Waiting for a response from the auth server...
epa.boostenter: Enter your email (which is linked to boosty)
text.autoconfig.epa.title: Enchanted Player Animations
text.autoconfig.epa.option.disableInCrea: Disable animations if the player is in creative flight
text.autoconfig.epa.option.disablePerspe: Disable perspective change when playing emotes
text.autoconfig.epa.option.oldOffArmDete: Old version of second hand detection
In older versions, the emote of the punch was played for the hand that held the object, not the hand that was punch
text.autoconfig.epa.option.timeoutSecond: The time (in seconds) after which the player will become afk
text.autoconfig.epa.option.fixInvalidPos: Such as emotes for poses other than standing
text.autoconfig.epa.option.forcePlayEmot: Bypass emotecraft checks on emote playback
